title: What would be considered a huge army by ancient standards? Let's only consider the Mediterranean in this scenario. - Quora

response.answer_text: I’d say 80 thousand for HUGE. but a big size army it would be close to 30 thousand. Edit: I understand Caesars army of 50 k was huge too. But Alexander the greats was 30k. And I presume Alexander the Great is more ancient (obviously).!
